entry.title: I am doing approvals and tagging in WCM. I don't want user to do time confirmation in SAP PM
entry.content:
During Approvals and Tagging process, we want the users to not post time confirmations or give an error. 

 

How can I do that to the PM work order?

entry.title: Dedicated SAP Aspirant Seeking Mentorship – Offering Unique Value in Return
entry.content:
Dear Mentor,

I’m currently based near Tokyo, having moved to Japan with a singular focus: to build a career in SAP. I hold near-native Japanese fluency (JLPT N1 level), and my previous experience using SAP has shown me firsthand the challenges users face. I’m determined to transition into the integrator or solutions architect side of SAP, with the long-term goal of working across global markets.

I understand that mentorship is a two-way relationship. To bring immediate value, I can leverage my local knowledge and language skills to craft a personalized trip through Japan for you—serving as both interpreter and guide to provide an authentic, insider experience.

This offer isn’t just about a trade; it’s proof of my dedication and resourcefulness in pursuing this path. I would be honored to learn under your guidance and assure you that your investment of time will be well-placed.

Sincerely,
Rye

entry.title: During Self Billing invoice MRRL,the invoice is posted but in the table BSEG, the field FDTAG(Planni
entry.content: During Self Billing invoice MRRL,the invoice is posted but in the table BSEG, the field FDTAG(Planning date) not updated

entry.title: User Profile without role
entry.content:
Hi Everyone,

I need for an external company an authorization profile witout any roles.

Background is that the company is taking care of our system and some times they needs extra access rights for Tcodes. If so they will ONLY add the needed authorization profile (No Roles) to their SAP user when needed.

I have read that with SU02 this was be possible but it looks like not anymore. I will always be forwarded to PFCG.

We are still working with ERP 6.0

Has anyone a solution or workaround?

Thank you very much

Fabien

entry.title: Material price change error in MSC2N t-code .
entry.content:
We are facing an issue while changing one characteristic value in one batch classification in transaction MSC2N in our production system E40 -100.

It is showing “Price changes for material 910992 D6726-7 is not possible “.

Material is activated with Automatic batch valuation category

Material – 910992, Batch - D6726-7, Plant – US07

Characteristic: Z023_TRANS_2_HEXENAL (Trans-2-Hexanal)

entry.title: F110 Printout Error / GL account is not defined
entry.content:
The automatic payment function is not executing properly in F110.

・Proposal and payment processes are functioning correctly.
・The attached error occurs during print execution.

・Current account and bank suspense account settings are complete in FBZP.
・Transaction account settings are configured in Bank Account Specification and Automatic Payment Settings on BP.

 

Please advise if any other settings are required.

 

(Added) My FBZP and OBPM4 settings.

entry.title: Stock Quantity and Total Stock are not equal in TC: MB5K
entry.content:
Dear SAP:
    Stock Quantity and Total Stock are not equal in TC: MB5K. please correct, 
    list as attachment.
    The selecting following in mb5k:
      Valuation Area: 5792
      Checking Period: Stocks at End of Prev. Month

      Material: 

70A0651M1001

70A0651M1301

70A0651M1601

Please refer to the attachment: mb5k_20250922.doc

suewen

entry.title: /SDF/SMONの有効WP
entry.content:
ご担当者様

/SDF/SMONの有効WPの定義をご教示ください、
有効WPとはその時点で実行中のワークプロセスの合計でよいでしょうか？

有効WPには待機中のワークプロセスは含まれないという理解ですが、
これは正しいでしょうか。
弊社環境の/SDF/SMONの画面ショットを添付します。
この例だと8/29午前3:30以降、有効WPが3~4なので実行中のものが3~4で
待機中のワークプロセスが非常にあるという理解です。




------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: How to filter RSUSR200 report by company/country to monitor user master data
entry.content:
Hello experts,

I am a fresher new in a SAP world :). I need to organize user master data on a monthly basis to check if there are any new users created or deleted. Currently, I run the RSUSR200 report, but it shows all users across multiple countries in my workplace.

My requirement is to filter the output so that only users belonging to my company/country are displayed.

Is there a way to restrict RSUSR200 by company code or country?

Or is there another standard report or method to achieve this?

Ideally, I want to easily compare month by month to identify new and removed users.

Appreciate your guidance.

Thanks in advance!

entry.title: Unable to release a TR
entry.content:
We have collected the Complete Enterprise structure for 20 company code in a transport, the task is released however when we try to release the main TR it hangs. 

It worked for single company code but not for multiple ones

entry.title: KIT PURCHASE in SAP ERP S4HANA
entry.content:
Dear SAP Experts,

Iam an SAP MM Consultant and I need your help regarding the following client need: 

Some articles are purchased in KIT which is a grouping of components sold together as a single unit, the KIT is  purchased via a single PO, and in the PO we wish to see the list of components, then upon good receipt the stock for each componenet is updated. (Purchased in KIT and stored as component) 

When I did my reaserch I found that this is possible via the Module SAP Is-Retail (KIT Purchase in SAP IS-RETAIL) , this module is not activated for my client

Note : EWM is also not activated for my client

My question is :

1-Is there any other standard SAP solution that allows the purchasing of a KIT that I can explore ?

2- The module IS-reatail is my only option or is there other workaround solution in SAP Standard ?

3- The module IS-RETAIL need a seperate licence ? I can"t just activate it like other SAP standard module ?

Thank you in Advance

entry.title: SAP script enhanced search issue
entry.content:
Hello SAP users,

I have a huge request for help.
This is my first time creating a VBA script that works with SAP.
The script is designed to open a drawing of the material after entering the material number in the material field.
Everything works, except for one thing.
When the script is enabled, the Enhanced Search window is missing.

Do you think there's any code missing that would, for example, trigger the Enhanced Search (material suggestions)?

I would be grateful for your help.

Bellow my code:


1. When script is turn off, I have enhanced search:

2. But when script is working, I haven't Enhanced Search:

Best regards,
d_z

entry.title: PO output message
entry.content:
When creation a PO with release strategy, an output message (Idoc) is created.
If I update my PO while the PO is not released, adding an Item (for example), the output message is suppressed.
Is it a normal SAP behavior ? How can we keep the output message ?
Thank"s for your feedback

entry.title: Business Area in S_ALR_87012082 report
entry.content: Is there any possible way to add Business Area in S_ALR_87012082 standard report in ECC?

entry.title: Problem with automatic fixing of schedule line by mrp run
entry.content:
Hi all,
i have a problem with automatic fixing of schedule line by mrp run.

If the schedule is set after a manual change to the delivery plan, everything is correct.
If, however, the MRP automatically sets the schedules, it duplicates them with each run, despite having entered both the value blank and the value 1 in the Debt field, per plan, in the delivery plan.

 

Some solutions?

entry.title: Cannot transfer pr to po in ME21N
entry.content:
Cannot transfer pr to po in ME21N

We use 3rd party purchase function, sales order number 5002249353, PR NO. 1159015434, vendor 50083, Purchase Org. 7002, purchase group 800, company code 7002,payment terms 0004. Put the PR into shopping cart then click check button there is no red warning message. But when user save the PO, system gave message 2 pop-up window: 1.No update of sales order 5002249353 from purchase order (error V1 903), after close this one, another came. 2. System error (error in method PO_POST). And after that no PO number generated.

entry.title: Multiple Functional Modules
entry.content:
Dear Senior Profesionals,

What is the advantage of learning Multiple Functional Modules in SAP?

Example: I am a SAP SD consultant with over 7 years of experience.

I am interested in learning SAP TM ,SAP GTS and SAP EWM.

I want to become a SAP Logistics consultant.

Or learn ABAP and become Techno-Functional consultant?

How should I proceed with my Career?

I am good at subject but need expertise in Client facing skills,  Requirements gathering and communication skills.

Please advise.

entry.title: Custom Fields Added in TMR1,TM00,TX-3,TPM13 and S_ALR_87015205
entry.content:
Dear Team,

We have added two custom fields in the FTR_CREATE screen under the custom Additional tab and are saving the data in the VTBFHA table. The data is reflected correctly in the VTBFHA table and custom Append Structure VTMFHA

These two fields also need to be included in the following reports:

  • TMR1
  • TM00
  • TX-3
  • S_ALR_87015205
  • TPM13

Currently:

  • In TM00, the custom fields are displayed, and values are appearing correctly.
  • In the other reports mentioned above, the fields are not showing, and values are not appearing correctly.
  • Additionally, in TM00, the Dynamic Selection option is greyed out. Could you please advise me on how to activate the Dynamic Selection for this report?

Requesting your support to:

  1. Add the two custom fields in the above-listed reports.
  2. Help resolve the Dynamic Selection activation issue in TM00.

 I have attached detail document please refer to attached and provide the your valuable solution
